column4: Is there a program like "virtual audio cables" for linux? Virtual audio cables allows you to take the audio output from one program, and use it as the input for another program, for example, form skype, to a recording program.
I know one program that kindof does that (not from one program to the other... but it records the output on the sound device)... it's vsound
ah, see, that is only half a solution for me, as it only records the output half(the other caler) and not the input half(the stuff coming from my mic)...
